Title: Chapter XVIII: Moon Rises, Raven Seeks
Writer: Alfred Gough (created by), Miles Millar (created by), Matt Lambert
Actors: Daniel Wu, Emily Beecham, Aramis Knight, Orla Brady
Plot: Sunny and Bajie seek help from Lydia. The Widow struggles to control M.K. Pilgrim seeks to establish a new order in the Badlands.
